Title: Step 4: Return to Curator Evelyn Marston
Text: After exploring the museum exhibits, I should return to Curator Evelyn Marston. She mentioned she'd have something for me once I finished the tour—likely a recommendation that I need to proceed further in the process of obtaining my Marksmanship License.

Lore: §aEndorsed by the War Museum for dedication to Gramados' legacy.
display.Name: §3Curator's Recommendation Letter

CompleteText: Curator Evelyn Marston was pleased with my exploration of the museum and provided me with a recommendation letter. This letter will be essential as I continue my journey to earn the Marksmanship License. Now, I should head back to Marcus Eldridge to review my progress.
